original_text: Did Hezekiah king of Judah and all Judah put him to death? Did he not fear the Lord and entreat the favor of the Lord, and did not the Lord relent of the disaster that he had pronounced against them? But we are about to bring great disaster upon ourselves.”
korean_text: 유다의 왕 히스기야와 모든 유다가 그를 죽였느냐 히스기야가 여호와를 두려워하여 여호와께 간구하매 여호와께서 그들에게 선언한 재앙에 대하여 뜻을 돌이키지 아니하셨느냐 우리가 이같이 하면 우리의 생명을 스스로 심히 해롭게 하는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Did Hezekiah king of Judah and all Judah put him to death?
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕 히스기야와 모든 유다가 그를 죽였느냐?

sentences.original_text: Did he not fear the Lord
and entreat the favor of the Lord
and did not the Lord relent of the disaster
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 그 재앙을 거두지 않으셨더냐

sentences.original_text: that he had pronounced against them?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 선포했던 그 재앙을 말이다

sentences.original_text: But we are about to bring great disaster upon ourselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리는 우리에게 큰 재앙을 불러오고 있다.
